1370: Vais was born in Davids hof in 1370.
Got married to Ricmoden at age 25 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Ricmoden, Berta, at age 25.
1371: Had a daughter with Ricmoden, Leanne, at age 26.
1372: Had a daughter with Ricmoden, Liedelde, at age 27.
1373: Had a daughter with Ricmoden, Tetta, at age 28.
1374: Lost daughter Berta when Berta was 5 years old.
1377: Had a daughter with Ricmoden, Uergina, at age 32.
1379: Had a daughter with Ricmoden, Folqui, at age 34.
1382: Lost daughter Uergina when Uergina was 6 years old.
1385: Had a daughter with Ricmoden, Waldrada, at age 40.
